name: Fix Bug
description: Analizar y corregir un bug espec√≠fico

values.task: Identify the root cause and fix the bug described below.
values.context: Analyze the provided code and error messages carefully.
values.constraints:
- Minimal changes only
- Don't refactor unrelated code
- Preserve existing behavior
values.output:
1. Root cause analysis
2. Fixed code with comments
3. Test case to prevent regression
